member.summary: Represents an HTML comment.

member.name: T:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNode
member.summary: Represents an HTML node.

member.name: F:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNode.HtmlNodeTypeNameComment
member.summary: Gets the name of a comment node. It is actually defined as '#comment'.

member.name: F:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNode.HtmlNodeTypeNameDocument
member.summary: Gets the name of the document node. It is actually defined as '#document'.

member.name: F:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNode.HtmlNodeTypeNameText
member.summary: Gets the name of a text node. It is actually defined as '#text'.

member.name: F:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNode.ElementsFlags
member.summary: Gets a collection of flags that define specific behaviors for specific element nodes. The table contains a DictionaryEntry list with the lowercase tag name as the Key, and a combination of HtmlElementFlags as the Value.

member.name: M:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNode.#cctor
member.summary: Initialize HtmlNode. Builds a list of all tags that have special allowances

member.name: M:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNode.#ctor(HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNodeType,HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocument,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes HtmlNode, providing type, owner and where it exists in a collection

member.name: M:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNode.CanOverlapElement(System.String)
member.summary: Determines if an element node can be kept overlapped.
member.param: The name of the element node to check. May not be null.
member.returns: true if the name is the name of an element node that can be kept overlapped, false otherwise.

member.name: M:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNode.CreateNode(System.String)
member.summary: Creates an HTML node from a string representing literal HTML.
member.param: The HTML text.

member.name: M:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNode.IsCDataElement(System.String)
member.summary: Determines if an element node is a CDATA element node.
member.param: The name of the element node to check. May not be null.
member.returns: true if the name is the name of a CDATA element node, false otherwise.

member.name: M:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNode.IsClosedElement(System.String)
member.summary: Determines if an element node is closed.
member.param: The name of the element node to check. May not be null.
member.returns: true if the name is the name of a closed element node, false otherwise.

member.name: M:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNode.IsEmptyElement(System.String)
member.summary: Determines if an element node is defined as empty.
member.param: The name of the element node to check. May not be null.
member.returns: true if the name is the name of an empty element node, false otherwise.

member.name: M:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNode.IsOverlappedClosingElement(System.String)
member.summary: Determines if a text corresponds to the closing tag of an node that can be kept overlapped.
member.param: The text to check. May not be null.

member.summary: Creates a duplicate of the node and changes its name at the same time.
member.param: The new name of the cloned node. May not be null.
true to recursively clone the subtree under the specified node; false to clone only the node itself.

member.name: M:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNode.CloneNode(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a duplicate of the node.
member.param: true to recursively clone the subtree under the specified node; false to clone only the node itself.

member.name: M:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNode.CopyFrom(HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNode)
member.summary: Creates a duplicate of the node and the subtree under it.

member.name: M:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNode.CopyFrom(HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNode,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a duplicate of the node.
member.param: The node to duplicate. May not be null.
true to recursively clone the subtree under the specified node, false to clone only the node itself.

member.summary: Gets all Descendant nodes for this node and each of child nodes

member.summary: Returns a collection of all descendant nodes of this element, in document order

member.summary: Gets first generation child node matching name

member.name: M:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNode.GetAttributeValue(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Helper method to get the value of an attribute of this node. If the attribute is not found, the default value will be returned.
member.param: The name of the attribute to get. May not be null.
The default value to return if not found.
member.returns: The value of the attribute if found, the default value if not found.

member.name: M:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNode.GetAttributeValue(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Helper method to get the value of an attribute of this node. If the attribute is not found, the default value will be returned.
member.param: The name of the attribute to get. May not be null.
The default value to return if not found.
member.returns: The value of the attribute if found, the default value if not found.

member.summary: Helper method to get the value of an attribute of this node. If the attribute is not found, the default value will be returned.
member.param: The name of the attribute to get. May not be null.
The default value to return if not found.
member.returns: The value of the attribute if found, the default value if not found.

member.name: M:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNode.InsertAfter(HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNode,HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNode)
member.summary: Inserts the specified node immediately after the specified reference node.
member.param: The node to insert. May not be null.
The node that is the reference node. The newNode is placed after the refNode.

member.name: M:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNode.InsertBefore(HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNode,HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNode)
member.summary: Inserts the specified node immediately before the specified reference node.
member.param: The node to insert. May not be null.
The node that is the reference node. The newChild is placed before this node.

member.summary: Adds the specified node to the beginning of the list of children of this node.

member.param: The node list to add. May not be null.

The node being replaced in the list.

member.summary: Helper method to set the value of an attribute of this node. If the attribute is not found, it will be created automatically.

The value for the attribute.

member.summary: Saves all the children of the node to the specified TextWriter.
member.param: The TextWriter to which you want to save.

member.summary: Saves all the children of the node to a string.

member.summary: Saves the current node to a string.

member.name: P:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNode.Attributes
member.summary: Gets the collection of HTML attributes for this node. May not be null.

member.summary: Gets all the children of the node.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating if this node has been closed or not.

member.name: P:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNode.ClosingAttributes
member.summary: Gets the collection of HTML attributes for the closing tag. May not be null.

member.summary: Gets the first child of the node.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the current node has any attributes.

member.name: P:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNode.HasChildNodes
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this node has any child nodes.

member.name: P:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNode.HasClosingAttributes
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the current node has any attributes on the closing tag.

member.name: P:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNode.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the value of the 'id' HTML attribute. The document must have been parsed using the OptionUseIdAttribute set to true.

member.summary: Gets or Sets the HTML between the start and end tags of the object.

member.summary: Gets or Sets the text between the start and end tags of the object.

member.name: P:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNode.LastChild

member.summary: Gets the line number of this node in the document.

member.summary: Gets or sets this node's name.

member.name: P:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNode.NodeType
member.summary: Gets the type of this node.

member.name: P:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNode.OriginalName
member.summary: The original unaltered name of the tag

member.summary: Gets or Sets the object and its content in HTML.

member.name: P:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNode.OwnerDocument

member.summary: Gets the node immediately preceding this node.

member.name: P:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNode.StreamPosition
member.summary: Gets the stream position of this node in the document, relative to the start of the document.

member.name: P:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNode.XPath

member.name: P:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlCommentNode.Comment
member.summary: Gets or Sets the comment text of the node.

member.name: P:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlCommentNode.InnerHtml
member.summary: Gets or Sets the HTML between the start and end tags of the object. In the case of a text node, it is equals to OuterHtml.

member.name: P:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlCommentNode.OuterHtml
member.summary: Gets or Sets the object and its content in HTML.

member.name: T:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocument
member.summary: Represents a complete HTML document.

member.name: F:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocument.OptionAddDebuggingAttributes
member.summary: Adds Debugging attributes to node. Default is false.

member.name: F:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocument.OptionAutoCloseOnEnd
member.summary: Defines if closing for non closed nodes must be done at the end or directly in the document. Setting this to true can actually change how browsers render the page. Default is false.

member.name: F:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocument.OptionCheckSyntax
member.summary: Defines if non closed nodes will be checked at the end of parsing. Default is true.

member.name: F:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocument.OptionComputeChecksum
member.summary: Defines if a checksum must be computed for the document while parsing. Default is false.

member.name: F:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocument.OptionDefaultStreamEncoding
member.summary: Defines the default stream encoding to use. Default is System.Text.Encoding.Default.

member.name: F:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocument.OptionExtractErrorSourceText
member.summary: Defines if source text must be extracted while parsing errors. If the document has a lot of errors, or cascading errors, parsing performance can be dramatically affected if set to true. Default is false.

member.name: F:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocument.OptionExtractErrorSourceTextMaxLength
member.summary: Defines the maximum length of source text or parse errors. Default is 100.

member.name: F:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocument.OptionFixNestedTags
member.summary: Defines if LI, TR, TH, TD tags must be partially fixed when nesting errors are detected. Default is false.

member.name: F:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocument.OptionOutputAsXml
member.summary: Defines if output must conform to XML, instead of HTML.

member.name: F:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocument.OptionOutputOptimizeAttributeValues
member.summary: Defines if attribute value output must be optimized (not bound with double quotes if it is possible). Default is false.

member.name: F:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocument.OptionOutputOriginalCase
member.summary: Defines if name must be output with it's original case. Useful for asp.net tags and attributes

member.name: F:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocument.OptionOutputUpperCase
member.summary: Defines if name must be output in uppercase. Default is false.

member.name: F:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocument.OptionReadEncoding
member.summary: Defines if declared encoding must be read from the document. Declared encoding is determined using the meta http-equiv="content-type" content="text/html;charset=XXXXX" html node. Default is true.

member.name: F:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocument.OptionStopperNodeName
member.summary: Defines the name of a node that will throw the StopperNodeException when found as an end node. Default is null.

member.name: F:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocument.OptionUseIdAttribute
member.summary: Defines if the 'id' attribute must be specifically used. Default is true.

member.name: F:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocument.OptionWriteEmptyNodes
member.summary: Defines if empty nodes must be written as closed during output. Default is false.

member.name: M:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocument.#ctor
member.summary: Creates an instance of an HTML document.

member.name: M:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocument.GetXmlName(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a valid XML name.
member.param: Any text.
member.returns: A string that is a valid XML name.

member.name: M:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocument.HtmlEncode(System.String)
member.summary: Applies HTML encoding to a specified string.
member.param: The input string to encode. May not be null.

member.name: M:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocument.IsWhiteSpace(System.Int32)
member.summary: Determines if the specified character is considered as a whitespace character.
member.param: The character to check.
member.returns: true if if the specified character is considered as a whitespace character.

member.name: M:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocument.CreateAttribute(System.String)
member.summary: Creates an HTML attribute with the specified name.
member.param: The name of the attribute. May not be null.

member.name: M:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocument.CreateAttribute(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates an HTML attribute with the specified name.
member.param: The name of the attribute. May not be null.
The value of the attribute.

member.name: M:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocument.CreateComment
member.summary: Creates an HTML comment node.

member.name: M:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocument.CreateComment(System.String)
member.summary: Creates an HTML comment node with the specified comment text.
member.param: The comment text. May not be null.

member.name: M:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocument.CreateElement(System.String)
member.summary: Creates an HTML element node with the specified name.
member.param: The qualified name of the element. May not be null.

member.name: M:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocument.CreateTextNode
member.summary: Creates an HTML text node.

member.name: M:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocument.CreateTextNode(System.String)
member.summary: Creates an HTML text node with the specified text.
member.param: The text of the node. May not be null.

member.name: M:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocument.DetectEncoding(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Detects the encoding of an HTML stream.
member.param: The input stream. May not be null.

member.name: M:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocument.DetectEncoding(System.IO.TextReader)
member.summary: Detects the encoding of an HTML text provided on a TextReader.
member.param: The TextReader used to feed the HTML. May not be null.

member.name: M:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocument.DetectEncodingHtml(System.String)
member.summary: Detects the encoding of an HTML text.
member.param: The input html text. May not be null.

member.name: M:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocument.GetElementbyId(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the HTML node with the specified 'id' attribute value.
member.param: The attribute id to match. May not be null.
member.returns: The HTML node with the matching id or null if not found.

member.name: M:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocument.Load(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Loads an HTML document from a stream.
member.param: The input stream.

member.name: M:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocument.Load(System.IO.Stream,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Loads an HTML document from a stream.
member.param: The input stream.
Indicates whether to look for byte order marks at the beginning of the stream.

member.name: M:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocument.Load(System.IO.Stream,System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: Loads an HTML document from a stream.
member.param: The input stream.
The character encoding to use.

member.name: M:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocument.Load(System.IO.Stream,System.Text.Encoding,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Loads an HTML document from a stream.
member.param: The input stream.
The character encoding to use.
Indicates whether to look for byte order marks at the beginning of the stream.

The character encoding to use.
Indicates whether to look for byte order marks at the beginning of the stream.
The minimum buffer size.

member.name: P:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocument.CheckSum
member.summary: Gets the document CRC32 checksum if OptionComputeChecksum was set to true before parsing, 0 otherwise.

member.name: P:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocument.DeclaredEncoding
member.summary: Gets the document's declared encoding. Declared encoding is determined using the meta http-equiv="content-type" content="text/html;charset=XXXXX" html node.

member.name: P:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocument.DocumentNode
member.summary: Gets the root node of the document.

member.name: P:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocument.Encoding
member.summary: Gets the document's output encoding.

member.name: P:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocument.ParseErrors
member.summary: Gets a list of parse errors found in the document.

member.name: P:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocument.Remainder
member.summary: Gets the remaining text. Will always be null if OptionStopperNodeName is null.

member.name: P:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocument.RemainderOffset
member.summary: Gets the offset of Remainder in the original Html text. If OptionStopperNodeName is null, this will return the length of the original Html text.

member.name: P:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocument.StreamEncoding
member.summary: Gets the document's stream encoding.

member.summary: The node is a CDATA node.

member.summary: The node is empty. META or IMG are example of such nodes.

member.summary: The node will automatically be closed during parsing.

member.name: F:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlElementFlag.CanOverlap
member.summary: The node can overlap.

member.name: T:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlEntity
member.summary: A utility class to replace special characters by entities and vice-versa. Follows HTML 4.0 specification found at http://www.w3.org/TR/html4/sgml/entities.html

member.name: M:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlEntity.DeEntitize(System.String)
member.summary: Replace known entities by characters.
member.param: The source text.

member.name: M:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlEntity.Entitize(HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNode)
member.summary: Clone and entitize an HtmlNode. This will affect attribute values and nodes' text. It will also entitize all child nodes.
member.param: The node to entitize.

member.name: M:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlEntity.Entitize(System.String)
member.summary: Replace characters above 127 by entities.
member.param: The source text.

member.name: M:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlEntity.Entitize(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Replace characters above 127 by entities.
member.param: The source text.
If set to false, the function will not use known entities name. Default is true.

member.name: M:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlEntity.Entitize(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Replace characters above 127 by entities.
member.param: The source text.
If set to false, the function will not use known entities name. Default is true.
If set to true, the [quote], [ampersand], [lower than] and [greather than] characters will be entitized.

member.summary: A collection of entities indexed by name.

member.name: P:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlEntity.EntityValue
member.summary: A collection of entities indexed by value.

member.summary: Gets the type of error.

member.summary: Gets the line number of this error in the document.

member.summary: Gets the column number of this error in the document.

member.name: P:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlParseError.Reason
member.summary: Gets a description for the error.

member.name: P:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlParseError.SourceText
member.summary: Gets the the full text of the line containing the error.

member.name: P:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlParseError.StreamPosition
member.summary: Gets the absolute stream position of this error in the document, relative to the start of the document.

member.name: T:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlParseErrorCode
member.summary: Represents the type of parsing error.

member.name: F:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlParseErrorCode.TagNotClosed
member.summary: A tag was not closed.

member.name: F:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlParseErrorCode.TagNotOpened
member.summary: A tag was not opened.

member.name: F:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlParseErrorCode.CharsetMismatch
member.summary: There is a charset mismatch between stream and declared (META) encoding.

member.name: F:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlParseErrorCode.EndTagNotRequired
member.summary: An end tag was not required.

member.name: F:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlParseErrorCode.EndTagInvalidHere
member.summary: An end tag is invalid at this position.

member.summary: Gets or Sets the HTML between the start and end tags of the object. In the case of a text node, it is equals to OuterHtml.

member.summary: Gets or Sets the object and its content in HTML.

member.name: P:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlTextNode.Text
member.summary: Gets or Sets the text of the node.
